info:identity.info:name: com.ibm.streamsx.adaptiveparser.bro
info:identity.info:description:
Support for [https://www.bro.org/sphinx-git/logs/index.html|Bro logging] library.
Bro, a powerful network security monitor, which by default churns out ASCII logs in a easily parseable whitespace separated (column) format from network traffic, live or PCAP.
This toolkit provides multiple BroParser composites with a ready to use pre-configured AdaptiveParser operator, parameterized for Bro format parsing.
Below the list of BroParser operators:
BroCertParser BroCommParser BroConnParser BroDHCPParser BroDNSParser BroFilesParser BroHTTPParser BroNoticeParser BroSimpleParser BroSSLParser
